name: Tensen Nyannyan Gekijouban
overview: Tensen Nyannyan Gekigyouban is a adventure mahjong game in which the player controls a young girl that will advance through the adventure playing mahjong games against other characters that she will encounter during the journey, To advance in the game the player should win the mahjong games. The gameplay is the usual in a mahjong game and the game uses a first person perspective for the adventure and for the mahjong part.
